Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID Syndrome: Lesson Learned and Future Implications.

Abstract.AbstractText: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), the virus responsible for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), has caused severe illness and mortality on a global scale, with an impact not witnessed since the 1918-19 Spanish influenza pandemic [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Center for Public Health Research (CESP), Department of Medicine and Surgery, University of Milan-Bicocca, I-20900 Monza, Italy.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The author declares no conflict of interest.
